      89             : // Subclassed to store platform-specific code cleaned out when font entry is
      90             : // deleted.
      91             : // Lifetime: from when platform font is created until it is deactivated.
      92             : // If the platform does not need to add any platform-specific code/data here,
      93             : // then the gfxUserFontSet will allocate a base gfxUserFontData and attach
      94             : // to the entry to track the basic user font info fields here.

     345             :         // Key used to look up entries in the user-font cache.
     346             :         // Note that key comparison does *not* use the mFontEntry field
     347             :         // as a whole; it only compares specific fields within the entry
     348             :         // (weight/width/style/features) that could affect font selection
     349             :         // or rendering, and that must match between a font-set's userfont

     674             : 
     675             :     // detailed load state while font data is loading
     676             :     // used to determine whether to use fallback font or not
     677             :     // note that code depends on the ordering of these values!
     678             :     enum FontDataLoadingState {
     679             :         NOT_LOADING = 0,     // not started to load any font resources yet
     680             :         LOADING_STARTED,     // loading has started; hide fallback font
     681             :         LOADING_ALMOST_DONE, // timeout happened but we're nearly done,
     682             :                              // so keep hiding fallback font
     683             :         LOADING_SLOWLY,      // timeout happened and we're not nearly done,
     684             :                              // so use the fallback font
     685             :         LOADING_TIMED_OUT,   // font load took too long
     686             :         LOADING_FAILED       // failed to load any source: use fallback
     687             :     };

     696             :     // This field is managed by the nsFontFaceLoader. In the destructor and Cancel()
     697             :     // methods of nsFontFaceLoader this reference is nulled out.
     698             :     nsFontFaceLoader* MOZ_NON_OWNING_REF mLoader; // current loader for this entry, if any
     699             :     gfxUserFontSet*          mFontSet; // font-set which owns this userfont entry
